name: Robot Walk
description:
Take your robot out for a walk!

An unfinished game made for LD46, with the theme "keep it alive".  This was meant to be a larger game tasking you to defend the robot and collect resources outside to keep it going. In the end, I only had time to implement the robot itself.

Use WASD to move around.
Enter the robot through the holes on the left and right side.
Use the button in the top left to make it move. Use the button below it to stop.
Use the left and right buttons at the top to steer the robot.

Made with luxe (https://luxeengine.com/)
